withholdings.6(a): Information on pages 15, 16, 17, and 21 may have been withheld under section 6(a)
withholdings.6(c): Information on pages 15, 16, 17, and 21 may have been withheld under section 6(c)

notices.title: Unclear redactions
notices.message: The OIA response letter specified that information in this file has been withheld under sections 6(a) and 6(c) of the OIA. However, where information has been withheld in the document the specific reason for it being withheld was not specified.
